oai_dc:dc.dc:title: D. Thorne peition to county court for payment for storage of records during Civil War
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Petition of D. Thorne, Hardeman County commissioner, requesting restitution for storage of county documents during the Civil War. This document shows that when the courthouse was burned during the Civil War, none of the county records were in it. Original record in the Hardeman County Archives.
